plugins

Interface Plugin

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CesarCode, RemoveVowels, ToLowerCase, ToUpperCase

    public interface Plugin
    represents a pluginTest that can be dynamiccaly added to the extendable editor. A pluginTest can perform a transformation on a String. A menu item corresponds to a a pluginTest in the editor. The label of this item is given by the getLabel methid.
    Author:
    Thomas OSTROWSKI - Valentin BOMY

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getLabel()
      returns a label associated to this pluginTest.
      java.lang.String helpMessage()
      a help message describing the pluginTest tranformation operation
      java.lang.String transform(java.lang.String s)
      performs a transformation on a string
